extraction_note: Copied from extracted_data1 directory - Matter 1.4 cluster data

attributes.name: MeasuredValue
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL represent the most recent measurement as a single-precision floating-point number.

attributes.name: MinMeasuredValue
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL represent the minimum value of MeasuredValue that is capable of being measured.

attributes.name: MaxMeasuredValue
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL represent the maximum value of MeasuredValue that is capable of being measured.

attributes.name: PeakMeasuredValue
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL represent the maximum value of MeasuredValue that has been measured during the PeakMeasuredValueWindow.

attributes.name: PeakMeasuredValueWindow
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL represent the window of time used for determining the PeakMeasuredValue.

attributes.name: AverageMeasuredValue
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL represent the average value of MeasuredValue that has been measured during the AverageMeasuredValueWindow.

attributes.name: AverageMeasuredValueWindow
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL represent the window of time used for determining the AverageMeasuredValue.

attributes.name: Uncertainty
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL represent the uncertainty of the measurement.

attributes.name: MeasurementUnit
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL represent the unit of measurement.

attributes.name: MeasurementMedium
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL represent the medium of measurement.

attributes.name: LevelValue
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL represent the level of concentration.
